Articles.Content:
Firstly, you should have listed the modules in the configs in the same order so all parts would have displayed in the same order.

Secondly, with ialdabaoth's modulemanager.dll, it adds modules it adds or replaces at the bottom of the list so only sorting in the config is no longer feasible.

Add a routine to print the module info in a specific order. [Module info is the stuff in the box below "Description" in the part info display.]
